lead_paragraph: GOTTLIEB--Andrew S. Beloved husband of MaryAnn, loving brother of Jerry, passed away at age 75 on February 20th after cardiac arrest. Andy loved life, people, classical music, and most of all he loved MaryAnn. May he rest in peace. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOTTLIEB, ANDREW S

snippet: GOTTLIEB--Andrew S. Beloved husband of MaryAnn, loving brother of Jerry, passed away at age 75 on February 20th after cardiac arrest. Andy loved life, people, classical music, and most of all he loved MaryAnn. May he rest in peace. 1/3
